DataElement.preferredName: Exercise Tolerance Test End Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text response that describes another reason why the exercise tolerance test was terminated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness._Increased resistance to the usual effects of a drug as a result of long-term continual use._A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something._The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.:Increased resistance to the usual effects of a drug as a result of long-term continual use.:A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Activity that requires physical or mental exertion, especially when performed to develop or maintain fitness.

A reduction in the sensitivity to a drug following its repeated administration, in which increased doses are required to produce the same magnitude of effect previously produced by a smaller dose. This increase in dose may be necessitated by changes in the metabolism of the drug, or a cellular, physiological or behavioral adaptation to the effects of the drug.
A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Property.preferredDefinition: The point or place at which something terminates in time or space.

Concepts.definition: The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
